definition: to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: The Liberal Democrat from New Jersey died Monday. He was 89.
sentences.chinese: 勞坦柏是新澤西的自由民主黨成員，享年89歲。

sentences.english: That could mean conflict with her new partner, the FDP.
sentences.chinese: 這意味着可能與她的新盟友自由民主黨發生衝突。

sentences.english: And the Lib Dems got all this despite flopping at the polls.
sentences.chinese: 而且自由民主黨在民意調查中是侮辱性的失敗了。

sentences.english: British Liberal Democrat leader Menzies before?
sentences.chinese: 英國自由民主黨前領袖孟席斯？

sentences.english: He is the leader of the pro-business Free Democratic Party, which strongly supports nuclear power.
sentences.chinese: 他是商界自由民主黨的領導人，強烈支持使用核能。

sentences.english: Both the Tories and their Liberal Democratic appendage have plummeted in the opinion polls.
sentences.chinese: 保守黨和自由民主黨的在民意調查中都已急劇下跌。

sentences.english: The Lib Dems just wrote its natural ending.
sentences.chinese: 自由民主黨也就寫了個大結局。

sentences.english: We no longer understand what the Liberal Democrats stand for.
sentences.chinese: 我們再也搞不清自由民主黨的立場是什麼。

sentences.english: Also on the new Conservative-Liberal Democrat legislative agenda was the topic of immigration.
sentences.chinese: 同時，新保守派自由民主黨的立法議程是移民問題。

sentences.english: The winners were the smaller parties, notably the Left Party and the Free Democrats.
sentences.chinese: 贏家是較小的政黨，特別是左冀黨和自由民主黨。

sentences.english: Cameron has formed a coalition government with the leader of the third-place Liberal Democrats.
sentences.chinese: 卡梅倫已與第三位的自由民主黨領袖組成聯合政府。

definition: François Hollande (1954-), French Socialist politician, president of France 2012-2017
lower chamber (of legislative body)/lower house/the House of Commons
